Detailed Description

Obsolete - the class Menu, which uses the AccessorAction, has been replaced by the classes ItemMenu and ItemTree.

May contain a menu-accessor and allows together with the class AbstractActionMenuAccessor the implementation of a menu-hierarchy. When an accessor-action is triggered inside a menu, the current accessor of the menu is replaced by the accessor from accessor-action, which means traversing down the menu-hierarchy.
